name: HanoverEvangelicalFriendsChurch
0:
”Alexa, open hanover friends church”
”Alexa, ask hanover friends church for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start hanover friends church”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hanover friends church
des:
Listen to the Hanover Evangelical Friends Church sermon podcast every Sunday morning as Senior Pastor Ed Vinson opens the Word of God and shares about the abundant life available to all through our savior, Jesus Christ. Hanover Evangelical Friends Church is located in Mechanicsville, VA. Visit www.friendlychurch.org to learn more about Hanover Evangelical Friends Church.

You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
